JobTitle: Sr Product Marketing Manager, Teams Phone Product Marketing
JobFullDesc: Modernizing Communications with Microsoft Teams Come join the marketing team for the fastest growing product in Microsoft history!  Microsoft Teams is an all-in-one collaboration platform, and Microsoft Teams Phone is an integrated cloud-based phone system that allows organizations to stay connected with colleagues and customers.  Modernizing communications with Teams Phone helps organizations enable business continuity, simplify hybrid work, and ensure people can stay connected on a personal level. The Teams Phone product marketing team is responsible for driving awareness & understanding of Teams’ calling capabilities.  Teams Phone is a secure, robust solution that is being used by both large call centers and individuals alike. It can be deployed quickly using existing Telco provider calling plans or a Microsoft calling plan in select markets.   And yet – so many organizations are still stuck with an outdated, on-premises telephony system with costly hardware – and those communication tools were not designed for modern collaboration needs.  We want you to help lead this journey!       ResponsibilitiesThe Teams Phone breadth marketer will be responsible for expanding the reach of our messaging to new audiences and smaller organizations through thoughtful digital marketing strategies.  The following are primary accountabilities of the role:Partner with web and digital marketing teams to design a world-class web presence and drive impressions of our web assetsDevelop the funnel strategy to drive awareness of Teams Phone, and lead engagement with the Relationship Marketing teamPlan and execute social strategies around key product launches and marketing eventsCreate Teams Phone messaging, marketing content, training materials, and guidance that is relevant and helpful for small/medium-business customersUse data to measure the effectiveness of marketing assets and develop improvement recommendationsIdentify opportunities to improve digital customer journeysHelp foster a caring and inclusive team cultureQualifications5+ years of software product marketing, product management, or relevant management consulting experience; unified communications or telephony experience preferredDemonstrated ability to create clarity around complex business challenges, influence cross-functional stakeholders, and communicate results to an executive audienceSuccessful history of driving digital marketing efforts to achieve business outcomesExperience using data to measure marketing effectiveness and identify improvement opportunitiesStrong attention to detail, with a high bar for quality deliverables (written and presentations)Understanding of digital customer journeys, in particular for B2B SaaS (preferred)Bachelor’s degree preferred Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer.
